Package com.metsci.glimpse.canvas

Heavy weight canvases on which all Glimpse rendering is performed.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GlimpseCanvas
    A heavy weight target for Glimpse rendering.
    NewtGlimpseCanvas  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGlimpseCanvas  
    FBOGlimpseCanvas  
    LayoutManager
    GlimpseLayout helper class which manages properly sorting GlimpseLayouts by their integer ordering constant (and by order of addition when two layouts have the same ordering constant).
    LayoutManager.LayoutOrder  
    LayoutManager.LayoutOrderComparator  
    NewtSwingGlimpseCanvas
    A GlimpseCanvas backed by the JOGL NewtCanvasAWT.
    SwingGlimpseCanvas Deprecated
    see NewtSwingGlimpseCanvas
    SwingLightweightGlimpseCanvas Deprecated
    see NewtSwingGlimpseCanvas

Package com.metsci.glimpse.canvas Description

Heavy weight canvases on which all Glimpse rendering is performed. Glimpse contains a GlimpseCanvas implementation for Swt and Swing as well as for various off-screen rendering targets.
